locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I‚Äôve been standing in the lobby for 30 mins waiting on a shower I spoke with someone 20 mins ago , none of the showers are in use and still no one has come to clean the showers.
I reserved a shower through the app on 10/19/23 at 10pm and there were two guests in front of me in the line. I received a message that my shower was ready at 5 am on 10/20/23. This is fine?

They close the showers overnight, but they still accept payment for them in the app, only to tell you the showers are down until 6:00 AM. So I can either wait 6 hours and miss my delivery, or throw the shower credit I already used in the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ young man was kind and thoughtful, and helped relieve some stress on a very long trip. The shower room was extremely clean, and my mom can't say enough good things about the young man who helped. Unfortunately she did not catch his name.
After a hot day, there is no shower for truckers...disappointing...

All I needed was a hot shower‚Ä¶. Not getting one of those here. Shower water is by far the most consistent cold showers I have seen.. this stop is going on the do not go section!!!!! Wish I could get my credit back!!!!

Best COLD showers around!

If you're looking for a reliably hot shower keep driving.  I stop here regularly but I won't be showering again until they fix this.
Open all exhausts and registers in the shower rooms to get 5 stars! After have taken shower my all stuff all shower floor, walls, ceiling, mirror, toilet seat are steamy and slippery.

‚Ä¶ are screwed again on points and they have jacked up the price of food no longer worth going to.. Well the showers are always good.. Atleast the hot water is constant but expect poo in the toilet and trash in the garbage can in your shower

Big fan of the coffee selection and the spacing of the pumps. Sells Cinnabon and has a Wendy's inside. Has parking for tractor trailers and shower facilities for truckers. They keep it clean and organized.

This place is nasty. One of the dirtier loves you come across. I was going to buy food and stuff here but decided just to eat out the truck after seeing how the bathrooms/showers are. Coffee Station was gross. You could see the thick layer ‚Ä¶

I see where loves keeps responding to complaints they will work towards better service, but after seeing blood in the toilet of my shower room before even taking a shower, I can assure you nothing is being done to improve. So sad.

‚Ä¶ bathroom walk in and take the dirty towels out and put cleans ones in. She didn‚Äôt bring one cleaning supply to clean and it showed when I walked in the shower. Shame on you Loves do better hire people who will actually clean it‚Äôs all type ‚Ä¶

Worst loves I've ever been to in 20 years.The sink had no water pressure, toilet wouldn‚Äôt stop running and the shower handle just fell off ..
Absolutely no water pressure in shower...waste basket hadn't been emptied in awhile üòï ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I went in on 6/4/25 and all of the staff was super friendly. Anthony and Towana are a credit to Flying J. The shower was clean and had great water pressure. I highly recommend this location.

I went in for a shower on 9/30/23 around 2pm. I was disgusted and disappointed. There was trash on the floor, fingernail clipping on the floor and in the shower, the toliet wasn't cleaned and there were stains all on the seat. The shower ‚Ä¶
Great customer service from check out and shower attendants Wednesday morning around 8! Showers and restrooms were nice and clean!

‚Ä¶ my fuel receipt. They were too busy bad-mouthing and gossiping about another employee's performance. I pity the driver who has to stop here and decides to get a shower. I can only imagine how gross those are. The franchise should be ‚Ä¶

This has to be the dirtiest shower I have ever seen. Fingernail clippings on the floor, dirt and hair around the toliet soap scum stains on the wall and an employee walked in twice. They had my shower "ready" for thw next guest before I ‚Ä¶
Anthony is awesome. Helped me tremendously this morning with a shower and my pilot card. Thanks so much.

Excellent staff!! Went in for a quick shower between loads and was pleasantly surprised with the assistance recipients from the staff. Anthony, in particular, was great beyond measure. I would definitely recommend to other drivers looking ‚Ä¶

Showers are clean, there's always a shower available, they always stay on top of food but where the store really shines is their staff. The staff are awesome they're all kind they're all engaging and they're all nice to engage with. Wheneve ‚Ä¶

Anthony and Sylvia were great. My husband and I aren't drivers but we're staying s9mewhere that doesn't have hot water and I was dying for a hot shower. Not being very familiar with how it worked Anthony showed us to our shower and told us ‚Ä¶
Shower are always clean, staff is always kind and courteous while still maintaining a professional environment. The food they have is fresh and readily available for any truck driver who's hungry!

showerReviews.reviewText: Great shower, I am disabled so we got the handicapped shower but there is no shower chair in the shower. I can not stand long due to my disability.  clean store, restaurant is small no salad bar, the food was great, only issue was paying ‚Ä¶

I rarely shower at Petro and have avoided TA Travel Centers, but since I had a shower credit, I decided to use it. To my surprise, shower 2 was spotless and sparkling. The older gentleman cleaning all the showers was working hard, which I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶.if i need to wait. for a shower to get a shower üöø n any of the river around. usa. well it be better. petro  .request 60 gallons to get a shower. those shower expire in 7 days. if u don‚Äôt have shower. u need pay $ 70‚Ä¶. plus they don‚Äôt pay ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ products. They do have hot and ready to eat sandwiches and food items. Restrooms small but clean. Clean shower . Friendly enough staff, parking area fills up fast, so the early bird gets the parking. Medium amount of parking.  Clean fuel ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ conduct their business. I pulled into pump 1 last night  11pm-1130pm on the 27th because it was open, I go in and take a quick shower no longer than 10 minutes which is the typical time frame allotted for the fuel island. Anyways I come out ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ The only reason they stay in business is because of the lack of choice in parking and they have a shower.

‚Ä¶ never found any reason to complain. Yes the parking lot is small, especially for a petro, but the showers are nice, the cashiers, shower attendants, and waitresses are delightful, and the food was great. Excellent place to take a break. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ pm restaurant closed they claim nobody to work, just another Covid excuse, and to top it off it‚Äôs 4:25 am shower closed because nobody can clean them, however you have an employee sitting on bench outside playing on phone for over an hour ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ all week long.  Go inside to eat and the waitresses said the place is closed Grill shut off 20 minutes early!!!!!  Wake up in a good mood going to take a shower.  May I remind you that time is my personal time!!!!! The girl that cleans ‚Ä¶

Tried getting a team shower to the lady up front and was immediately greeting with aggravation in her tone of voice, sorry for disturbing you from standing at your register but that's what you are here for. Def not going to be stopping here ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ of the nastiest truck stops I've been to. Fuel island was an oil slick. Obviously hadn't been cleaned in a coons age. Showers were disgusting. Very hastily "cleaned" not swept/ mopped mirror was filthy mold everywhere and the shower ‚Ä¶
Front desk, both ladies are unhelpful.  I asked them my truck smart isn't working, and I want to use my phone number for rewards to get a shower, but they keep refusing to help me.

‚Ä¶ parking lot, hire weaklings as security guards to enforce it. I paid for a spot but spent no penny on any other service. Not even shower, the place is nasty. 27 miles away is Loves, do yourself a favor and bypass unless you have emergency.
Not sure where to start. I will just say Shower wasn‚Äôt cleaned but I guess the person brought the bottle in to start on it. 95% of this place is reserved parking and is pre booked.

‚Ä¶ Cashier on May 7, 2024 at 9:28 pm was completely rude. We went to get a shower and the machine for whatever reason didn't print the receipt.  So my husband went up to ask for help. She reluctantly helped him and after of course, followed up ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ All the bathrooms were shut down at the same time‚Ä¶only option for ladies was to sneak in to a used shower stall. ‚Ä¶
